name: getImages
getweather
func:
var obj = JSON.parse(msg.payload) console.log(msg.payload) var precipitacao = obj.current.precip_mm; var umidade = obj.current.humidity var cidade = obj.location.name var temperatura = obj.current.temp_c var vento = obj.current.wind_kph console.log(cidade) msg.payload = " " + "

CITY: " + cidade + "

" + "

TEMPERATURE: " + temperatura + "

" + "

WIND SPEED: " + vento + "km/h

" + "

HUMIDITY: " + umidade + "

" + "

PRECIPITATION: " + precipitacao + "mm

" msg.payload += "

COVID-19 DATA:

TOTAL DEATHS BY COVID-19

NEW CASES

DAILY CASES

TOTAL CASES

" return msg;

name: CSS
HTML
template:
ConnectVid is an unique platform that gathers environmental and health data

to combat covid-19.
